TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageImageableArea extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可以列印的頁面區域。

span.span: Represents the area of a page that can be printed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的雷射和噴墨印表機必須離開頁面，即可避免碳粉移動工作表的組件的印表機上邊緣的列印的區域。Most laser and inkjet printers must leave an unprinted area around the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 針對大部分的相片印表機，不過，整個頁面來列印影像。For many photographic printers, however, the entire page is imageable. 類別包含與可做為影像的區域的相同資訊，而且也包含 頁面大小，請參閱。For a class that includes the same information about the imageable area as and also includes page size, see . > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: public double ExtentHeight { get; }
.property instance float64 ExtentHeight
Public ReadOnly Property ExtentHeight As Double
public: property double ExtentHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得可做為影像之區域的高度。

span.span: Gets the height of the imageable area.

value.span: ，表示可做為影像的區域高度 (以像素為單位，每像素為 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A that represents the height of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得從左上角，可做為影像的區域 （也稱為 「 來源 」 的可做為影像的區域） 的左下角的距離。The property gets the distance from the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area) to the lower-left corner.

MemberSignature.Value: public double ExtentWidth { get; }
.property instance float64 ExtentWidth
Public ReadOnly Property ExtentWidth As Double
public: property double ExtentWidth { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得可做為影像之區域的寬度。

span.span: Gets the width of the imageable area.

value.span: ，表示可做為影像的區域寬度 (以像素為單位，每像素為 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A that represents the width of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得從可做為影像 （也稱為 「 來源 」 的可做為影像的區域） 的區域的左上角到右上角的距離。The property gets the distance from the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area) to the upper-right corner.

MemberSignature.Value: public double OriginHeight { get; }
.property instance float64 OriginHeight
Public ReadOnly Property OriginHeight As Double
public: property double OriginHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得原始高度，也就是從可做為影像的區域左上角 (亦稱為可做為影像的區域「原點」) 到頁面上邊緣最接近點間的距離。

span.span: Gets the origin height, which is the distance from the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area) to the nearest point on the top edge of the page.

value.span: ，表示從頁面上邊緣到可做為影像的區域頂端間的距離 (以像素為單位，每像素為 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A that represents the distance from the top edge of the page to the top of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).

MemberSignature.Value: public double OriginWidth { get; }
.property instance float64 OriginWidth
Public ReadOnly Property OriginWidth As Double
public: property double OriginWidth { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得原始寬度，也就是從頁面左邊緣到可做為影像的區域左上角 (亦稱為可做為影像的區域「原點」) 間的距離。

span.span: Gets the origin width, which is the distance from the left edge of the page to the upper-left corner of the imageable area (also called the "origin" of the imageable area).

value.span: ，表示從頁面左邊緣到可做為影像的區域左邊緣間的距離 (以像素為單位，每像素為 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A that represents the distance from the left edge of the page to the left edge of the imageable area in pixels (1/96 of an inch).

public: override System::String ^ ToString();

span.span: A that represents the property values of the .
